00046 void MAlphaAnaInfo::ProcessOptions(int argc, char **argv)
00047 {
00048    int option_index = 0;
00049 
00050    static struct option long_options[] = {
00051       {"log",                 optional_argument,   0,   'l'},
00052       {"graph",               no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH},
00053 
00054       {"meas-list",           required_argument,   0,   MAlphaAnaInfo::OPTION_MLIST},
00055       {"output-file",         required_argument,   0,   MAlphaAnaInfo::OPTION_OFILE},
00056       {0, 0, 0, 0}
00057    };
00058 
00059    int c;
00060 
00061    while ((c = getopt_long(argc, argv, "?hlg::m:o:", long_options, &option_index)) != -1) {
00062       switch (c) {
00063 
00064          case '?':
00065          case 'h':
00066             PrintUsage();
00067             exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00068 
00069          case 'l':
00070             fFileStdLogName = (optarg != 0 ? optarg : "");
00071             break;
00072 
00073          case 'g':
00074          case AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH:
00075             fModes |= AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH;
00076             break;
00077 
00078          case 'm':
00079          case MAlphaAnaInfo::OPTION_MLIST:
00080             SetMListFileName(optarg);
00081             break;
00082 
00083          case 'o':
00084          case MAlphaAnaInfo::OPTION_OFILE:
00085             fOutputFileName = optarg;
00086             break;
00087 
00088          default:
00089             Error("ProcessOptions", "Invalid option provided");
00090             PrintUsage();
00091             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00092       }
00093    }
00094 }

00098 void MAlphaAnaInfo::VerifyOptions()
00099 {
00100    // The run name must be specified
00101    if (fMListFileName.empty()) {
00102       Error("VerifyOptions", "List file name has to be specified");
00103       PrintUsage();
00104       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00105    }
00106 
00107    if (fOutputFileName.empty()) {
00108       Error("VerifyOptions", "Output file name has to be specified");
00109       PrintUsage();
00110       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00111    }
00112 
00113    TString tmpFileName(fMListFileName.c_str());
00114 
00115    // file exists?
00116    if ( !gSystem->FindFile( (GetResultsDir() + "/runXX/lists/").c_str(), tmpFileName ) ) {
00117       Error("VerifyOptions",
00118             "File list \"%s\" not found\n", GetMListFullPath().c_str());
00119       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00120    }
00121 
00122    fOutputName = fMListFileName;
00123 }

00135 void MAlphaAnaInfo::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00136 {
00137    AnaInfo::PrintAsPhp(f);
00138    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMListFileName']               = \"%s\";\n", fMListFileName.c_str());
00139    fprintf(f, "\n");

00144 void MAlphaAnaInfo::PrintUsage()
00145 {
00146    cout << endl;
00147    cout << "Options:" << endl;
00148    cout << " -h, -?                               : Print this help" << endl;
00149    cout << " -g, --graph                          : Plot graphs" << endl;
00150    cout << " -m, --meas-list <file_name>          : Name of run with raw data in $CNIPOL_RESULTS_DIR directory" << endl;
00151    cout << " -o, --output-file <file_name>        : Output file name" << endl;
00152    cout << endl;
00153 }
